archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.1.2: Baseline requirements for securing different types of application (e.g. those offering transactional services, electronic ordering and payments, or safety critical systems) should be established and kept up to date.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
